lead_paragraph: Buffalo running back Willis McGahee is out indefinitely with three broken ribs, leaving the Bills without their best offensive threat against Indianapolis this weekend. Coach Dick Jauron ruled out McGahee yesterday, saying that McGahee’s injury was more severe than initially thought after Buffalo’s 24-10 win over Green Bay on Sunday.
